document_data.mainbody:
uckle Street was a hard-packed dirt and gravel paved road in Waterdeep that started in the citys Trades Ward and continued downward into the Southern Ward.
This road ran from north to south, running south off of River Street and cutting through Sahtyras Lane before entering the Southern Ward, wherein it ended in a dead end.
In the Trades Ward, Buckle Street acted as the eastern terminus of Salabar Street and Wagonrace, while in the Southern Ward it acted as the western terminus of Tornsar Alley
A number of merchants lived along this street, including Fylgard Onister.
